nodes.text: In 137 ABY, a meeting of Codru-Ji clan leaders was called by clan chief Rikkar-Du. The Sith of Darth Krayt's Galactic Empire was attempting to annex the Codru-Ji homeworld of Munto Codru and had approached Rikkar-Du to unite the clans under his rule. Rikkar-Du refused and called a meeting of the clan leaders to discuss opposition to the Sith's machinations.
